parameter.name: allowBasicAuth
parameter.label: Allow Basic Authentication
parameter.description: Allow the use of Basic authentication to access protected API resources, in addition to access tokens and API tokens.

parameter.name: implicitUserRole
parameter.label: Implicit user role for unauthenticated requests
parameter.description: By default, operations requiring the "user" role are available when unauthenticated. Disabling this option will enforce authorization for these operations. Warning: This causes clients that do not support authentication to break.
